Introduce the advantages of Guadalajara as a business hub.
Proximity to US: Only 2-3 hour flight from most US cities.
Cultural Alignment: More US culturally aligned than other traditional offshoring locations.
Time Zone: Same time zone as the US, facilitating easier communication.
Economic Benefits: Lower costs for establishing technical, back office, and manufacturing operations.
Educational Background: Significant educational qualifications of the employee base.
English Proficiency: High ability to speak English in a multi-national business environment.
Explanation of why Guadalajara is considered the "Silicon Valley" of Latin America.
Encourage visitors to reach out to learn more about the advantages of operating in Guadalajara.
